4.5 
Explain why data manipulation is important in a GIS. 
 
Data manipulation involves getting the different data sources into a format 
that can be integrated  
When all the data layers are in similar data files the data can be integrated 
(put together)      
Statistical information must be manipulated into such a file format that it can 
be used in the GIS software and linked to specific spatial features   
Errors in the database can be eliminated during manipulation  
[Any ONE. Concept]                  
(1 x 2)
